__e: Henry I know your heart is in the right place but you and Jasper have different ways of doing things.
I sometimes wonder ifl did right by you... puttin' you with Jasper and his kids.
I have heard about your son, but Jasper and my boy have need of you.
You want to think Jasper's a lost cause, go ahead.
I've seen all of the nighttime photos, and Jasper's dead, so... when was this taken?
Jasper's gone because you made me choose, but I won't be your puppet anymore.
Jasper has always been such a good boy.
I'm beginning to think someone else took Jasper, and mom's in trouble as well.
You heard what Jasper said on the radio.
